name: Curry Royale
description:
Made for the Games Now! Game Jam 2019

License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Six desperate curry ingredients wrestle for survival, as a hungry bystander attempts to skewer them all with a fork for sustenance. In order to be the last veggie standing, you must betray your fellow ingredients by bumping them into the way of the fork as it descends into the battle arena. In the end, there can only be one!

"An epic, magnificent, glorious and most of all succulent story about betrayal, companionship and curry." 5/5 - IMBD

Made by

Matt Bengston, Mathias Mäenpää, Niklas Svartbäck, Jon Galán, Daniel Leggat, Camilo Hernández

Resources used

Arvo font by Anton Koovit

Baloo Bhai font by Ek Type

sounds effects by InspectorJ at freesound.org
